data.name: منیج پترو - مدیریت حمل و نقل در حوزه نفت و گاز
data.description: شرکت Manage Petro از سال 2016 فعالیت در صنعت حمل و نقل نفت و گاز در ونکوور کانادا شروع نمود.  Manage Petro is a B2B SaaS solution for fuel delivery fleet owners who pick up fuel, propane, and lubricants from refineries and liver it to end users, such as gas station mines, farms, or construction sites. We provide them with full business management including ordering, dispatching, delivery, invoicing, and bookkeeping. The mobile app is the bridge between the office and drivers
